ModMetaData.name: Faux Rock Floor
ModMetaData.author: Toby
ModMetaData.description:
Adds buildable floors that look like natural rock, in rough or rough-hewn variations. Faster to build than Tiled Floors but also slightly more expensive. Can be smoothed.
There are quite possibly some bugs because what I did was so scuffed.
Also off Steam at: https://github.com/Toby222/FauxRockFloors
Goes well with MBS Faux Rock Wall (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=760281834)
